card_header: This is a planner to help you schedule your courses for whichever plan you decide on doing.
card_title: Options (click each section to see more)
accordion_descriptions:
A page where you can manage your courses. View a list of courses still available, and also customize courses as well. (More description as more functionality is added)
Semesters is a page where you can manage your semesters. View a list of semesters active, and customize their name, what time they are. (More description as more functionality is added)
Plans is a page where you can view your overall plans. View a list of plans active, and customize the individual plans. (More description as more functionality is added)
Import is a page where you can import your plans from a csv file
Export is a page where you can export your plans to a csv file to then be imported, or sent to other people
option_1_desc: A page where you can manage your courses. View a list of courses still available, and also customize courses as well. (More description as more functionality is added)
option_2_desc: Semesters is a page where you can manage your semesters. View a list of semesters active, and customize their name, what time they are. (More description as more functionality is added)
option_3_desc: Plans is a page where you can view your overall plans. View a list of plans active, and customize the individual plans. (More description as more functionality is added)
option_4_desc: Import is a page where you can import your plans from a csv file
option_5_desc: Export is a page where you can export your plans to a csv file to then be imported, or sent to other people
login_sub_header: Craft your degree plan! Fully customizable and tailored for the user experience, constantly being updated so stay tuned for updates!
sign_up_form1_input_error_max_length: Username can be at most {length} characters
sign_up_form1_input_error_min_length: Username must be at least {length} characters
sign_up_form1_input_validation_error: Username must not contain special characters
sign_up_form_password_max_length: Password must not be at most {length} characters.
sign_up_form_password_min_length: Password must be at least {length} character
